feed.title: Lac La Biche - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Lac La Biche
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:37 PM MST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -16.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lac La Biche 01:00 AM MST Sunday 01 January 2023
Temperature: -16.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa rising
Wind Chill: -20
Wind: S 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries after midnight. Fog. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 12:29 AM MST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Fog dissipating. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Fog becoming fog patches in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 12:29 AM MST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clearing. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 12:29 AM MST Sunday 01 January 2023
